Class WebAgentDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • WebAgentDB

  • public abstract class WebAgentDB
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which has methods and variables to do with the connection to the mySQL server by which WebAgent backs up and can retrieve and analyze data.
    Author:
    Alex

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WebAgentDB() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addToConvoDB(java.lang.Integer id, java.lang.Boolean user, java.lang.Integer previousID)
      A method which adds new Responses to the Conversations database, called during the back and forth bot and human interactions.
      static void addToDictDB(java.lang.Integer length, java.lang.String content) 
      static void connect()
      A method that connects to the mySQL database server on the current computer.
      static int count()
      A method which returns how many rows there are in the Dictionary table, useful for debugging the writing commands and server-client connection
      static void disconnect()
      A short method called to shut down the database connection, called when the program closes.
      static void instruct(java.lang.String inputStatement)
      A method to be called elsewhere, to easily pass SQL queries to be passed to the db server.
      static java.sql.ResultSet queryDB(java.lang.String query)
      A method which when passed a mySQL query, returns a corresponding result set if availabLe.
      static void rsToFile(java.sql.ResultSet toOutput, java.lang.String filename)
      A method which writes the contents of a result set to a file with a specified name, called by a console method.
